Verses: 1 en Meychchalin Aadugalaik Keduththu Sidharadikkira Meyppargalukku Aiyo! Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

2 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Janaththai Meykkira Meyppargalukku Virodhamaaga Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Neengal En Aadugalaip Paraamariyaamal, Avaigalai Sidharadiththu Avaigalaith Thuraththivitteergal; Idho, Naan Ungalperil Ungal Seygaigalin Pollaappukketra Thandanaiyai Ungalmel Varuvippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

3 naan En Aadugalil Meedhiyaayiruppavaigalaith Thuraththiyirundha Ellaa Dhesangalilumirundhu Serththu, Avaigalaith Thirumba Avaigalin Thozhuvangalukkuk Konduvaruven; Appozhudhu Avaigal Palugipperugum.
4 avaigalai Meykkaththakkavargalaiyum Avaigalmel Erpaduththuven; Ini Avaigal Bayappaduvadhumillai, Kalanguvadhumillai, Kaanaamarpovadhumillaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar.

5 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhukku Oru Needhiyulla Kilaiyai Ezhumbappannuven; Avar Raajaavaayirundhu, Gnaanamaai Raajarigampanni, Boomiyile Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Nadappippaar.
6 avar Naatkalil Yoodhaa Ratchikkappadum, Isravel Sugamaai Vaasampannum; Avarukku Idum Naamam Namadhu Needhiyaayirukkira Karththar Enbadhe.
7 aadhalaal, Idho, Naatkal Varum, Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirarai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththukkonduvandha Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Saththiyampannaamal,

8 isravel Veettin Sandhadhiyaaraith Thangal Suyadhesaththil Kudiyirukkumpadikku Vadadhesaththilum, Naan Avargalaith Thuraththiyirundha Ellaa Dhesangalilumirundhu Azhaiththu Vazhinadaththikkonduvandha Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Saththiyampannuvaargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 theerkkadharisigalinimiththam En Irudhayam En Ullaththile Norungiyirukkiradhu; En Elumbugalellaam Adhirugiradhu; Karththar Nimiththamum, Avarudaiya Parisuththa Vaarththaigalinimiththamum Naan Veriththirukkira Manushanaippolavum Madhubaanam Merkondavanaippolavum Irukkiren.

10 dhesam Vibasaarakkaararaal Niraindhirukkiradhu, Dhesam Saabaththinaal Dhukkikkiradhu, Vanaandharaththin Meychchalgal Vaadippogiradhu, Avargal Ottam Pollaadhadhu; Avargal Belan Aniyaayamaayirukkiradhu.
11 theerkkadharisiyum Aasaariyanum Maayakkaararaayirukkiraargal, En Aalayaththilum Avargaludaiya Pollaappaik Kanden Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

12 aadhalaal, Avargal Vazhi Avargalukku Iruttile Sarukkalaana Vazhiyaayirukkum, Thuraththundu Adhile Vizhuvaargal; Avargal Visaarikkappadum Varushaththile Avargalmel Pollaappai Varappannuvenendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 samaariyaavin Theerkkadharisigalilo Madhikettaik Kanden; Paagaalaikkondu Theerkkadharisanancholli, Isravel Ennum En Janaththai Mosampokkinaargal.

14 erusalemin Theerkkadharisigalilum Thidukkidaththakka Kaariyaththaik Kaangiren; Vibasaarampanni, Vanjagamaai Nadandhu, Oruvanum Than Pollaappai Vittuth Thirumbaadhapadikkup Pollaadhavargalin Kaigalaith Thidappaduththugiraargal; Avargal Ellaarum Enakku Sodhomaippolum, Adhin Kudigal Gomoraavaippolum Irukkiraargal.

15 aadhalaal Senaigalin Karththar Theerkkadharisigalaik Kuriththu: Idho, Naan Avargalukkup Pusikka Ettiyaiyum, Kudikkap Pichchukkalandha Thanneeraiyum Koduppen; Erusalemin Theerkkadharisigalilirundhu Maayamaanadhu Dhesamengum Parambitre Endru Sollugiraar.

16 ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalin Vaarththaigalaik Kelaadhirungal; Avargal Ungalai Veenperumai Kollumpadi Seygiraargal;karththarudaiya Vaakkai Alla, Thaangal Yoogiththa Dharisanaththai Sollugiraargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

17 avargal Ennai Asattaipannugiravargalai Nokki: Ungalukku Samaadhaanam Irukkumendru Karththar Sonnaarendru Sollugiradhumallaamal, Thangal Irudhayaththin Kadinaththile Nadakkira Yaavaraiyum Nokki: Ungalmel Pollaappu Varaadhendrum Sollugiraargal.
18 karththarudaiya Aalosanaiyil Koodanindru, Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kettarindhavan Yaar? Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Gavaniththuk Kettavan Yaar?
19 idho, Karththarudaiya Perunkaatraagiya Kodiya Pusal Purappattadhu; Adhu Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Thalaiyinmel Ukkiramaai Modhum.
20 karththar Thammudaiya Irudhayaththin Ninaivugalai Nadappiththu Niraivetrumalavum, Avarudaiya Kobam Thaniyaadhu; Kadaisinaatkalil Adhai Nandraai Unaruveergal.
21 andhath Theerkkadharisigalai Naan Anuppaadhirundhum Avargal Odinaargal; Avargalode Naan Pesaadhirundhum Avargal Theerkkadharisanan Chonnaargal.

22 avargal En Aalosanaiyile Nilaiththirundhaargaleyaagil, Appozhudhu Avargal En Vaarththaigalai Janangalukkuth Theriviththu, Avargalaith Thangal Pollaadha Vazhigalaiyum Thangal Seygaigalin Pollaappaiyum Vittuth Thiruppuvaargal.
23 naan Sameebaththirku Maaththiramaa Dhevan, Dhooraththirkum Dhevan Allavo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
24 yaavanaagilum Thannai Naan Kaanaadhapadikku Maraividangalil Oliththukkollakkoodumo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Nirappugiravar Allavo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
25 soppanankanden, Soppanankanden Endru, En Naamaththai Sollip Poiththeerkkadharisanam Uraikkira Theerkkadharisigal Sollugiradhaik Ketten.

26 edhuvaraikkum Ippadiyirukkum? Poiththeerkkadharisanam Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalin Irudhayaththile Edhaagilumundo? Ivargal Thangal Irudhayaththin Vanjagaththaiye Theerkkadharisanamaaga Sollugiravargal.

27 en Janaththin Pidhaakkal Paagaalinimiththam En Naamaththai Marandhadhupola, Ivargal Thangal Ayalaarukku Vivarikkira Thangal Soppanangalinaale En Naamaththai Avargal Marakkumpadi Seyyappaarkkiraargal.
28 soppanankanda Theerkkadharisi Soppanaththai Vivarippaanaaga; En Vaarththaiyullavano, En Vaarththaiyai Unmaiyaai Solvaanaaga; Kodhumaikkumun Padhar Emmaaththiram? Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
29 en Vaarththai Akkiniyaippolum, Kanmalaiyai Norukkum Sammattiyaippolum Irukkiradhallavo? Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
30 aagaiyaal, Idho, Ovvoruvaraaith Thanthan Ayalaaridaththil En Vaarththaiyaith Thiruttuththanamaai Edukkira Theerkkadharisigalukku Naan Virodhi Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
31 idho, Thangal Naavin Sollaiye Vazhangi, Avar Adhai Uraiththaar Endru Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalukku Naan Virodhi Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

32 idho, Poichchoppanangalaith Theerkkadharisanamaaga Solli, Avaigalai Vivariththu, En Janaththaith Thangal Poigalinaalum, Thangal Veembugalinaalum, Mosampokkugiravargalukku Naan Virodhi Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Avargalai Anuppinadhumillai, Avargalukkuk Karpiththadhumillai; Avargal Indha Janaththukku Oru Prayojanamaai Iruppadhumillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

33 karththaraale Sumarum Baaram Ennavendru Indha Janamaagilum Oru Theerkkadharisiyaagilum Oru Aasaariyanaagilum Unnaik Kettaal, Ungalaith Thallividuven Enbadhe Baaram Endru Nee Avargaludane Sollavendum.
34 karththaraal Sumarum Baaram Endru Sollugira Theerkkadharisiyaagilum Aasaariyanaagilum Janamaagilum Sari, Appadi Sollugira Manushanaiyum Avan Veettaaraiyum Dhandippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
35 karththar Enna Maru Uththaravu Koduththaar? Karththar Enna Sonnaar? Endru Neengal Avaravar Thangal Ayalaanaiyum Avaravar Thangal Sagodharanaiyum Ketpeergalaaga.

36 aanaal Karththaraal Varum Baaram Engira Sollai Ini Vazhangaadhiruppeergalaaga, Avan Vaarththaiye Avanavanukku Baaramaayirukkum; Adhenendraal, Namadhu Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Engira Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaigalaip Purattugireergal.
37 karththar Unakku Enna Maru Uththaravu Koduththaar? Karththar Enna Sonnaar? Endru Nee Theerkkadharisiyaik Ketpaayaaga.

38 neengalovenil, Karththaraal Sumarum Baaram Endru Sollugirapadiyinaale, Karththar Baaram Endru Sollaadhirungalendru Naan Ungalukku Solli Anuppiyum, Neengal Indha Vaarththaiyaik Karththarin Baaram Endru Sollugireergale.
39 aadhalaal, Idho, Naan Ungalai Marakkave Marandhu, Ungalaiyum, Naan Ungalukkum Ungal Pidhaakkalukkum Koduththa Nagaraththaiyum Enakku Munbaaga Iraadhapadikkuk Kaivittu,
40 marakkappadaadha Niththiya Nindhaiyaiyum Niththiya Lachchaiyaiyum Ungalmel Varappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
